snippet: Danny Granger had 26 points and 9 rebounds and Roy Hibbert added 18 points and 10 rebounds as Indiana beat Orlando, 97-74, in Game 3.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers beat Orlando Magic, 97-74, in Game 3 of their first-round playoff series to take a 2-1 lead; other NBA playoff results noted.
lead_paragraph: Danny Granger had 26 points and 9 rebounds and Roy Hibbert added 18 points and 10 rebounds as Indiana beat Orlando, 97-74, in Game 3.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs - Pacers Beat Magic for 2-1 Lead
headline.print_headline: Pacers Take 2-1 Lead on Magic; Spurs Put Jazz Behind, 2-0
